int SecurityLevel [get]
 The relative security level of the key vault permanent storage model.
 

Detailed Description

Pure interface definition that all .net key vaults must comply with.

Member Function Documentation

◆ cleanVaultStore()

virtual void IonicSecurity::SDK::KeyVaultInterface::cleanVaultStore ( )
pure virtual

Virtual function that needs to be overridden.

If the loadAllKeyRecords function fails, it may mean something is wrong or corrupt in the file itself. When this happens, the sync function will early out and the key vault can never repair itself. This function is designed to do that by simply deleting the corrupt storage.

Implemented in IonicSecurity::SDK::KeyVaultNative.
